item.description: The class runs from 7:30am to 8:30am on Sunday Morning. This class will be taught by Michelle P. We start with a very gentle warm up and breathing exercises. We move into a series of postures designed to stretch, strengthen, create flexibility, and increase relaxation and energy. We will then move into a relaxation and meditation and closing the class. Please remember: Wear comfortable clothing Bring water (we have water if you forget $1.00) Please don't eat before class. A health bar or yogurt should be fine for most people if you need to eat before doing yoga. The cost is $10 per class as a drop in rate. Package price of 6 classes for $48.00 is available. Cash or check only, please. x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x Post a comment... 500 characters left x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x Attended Didn't attend?
